content.rendered:
WordCamp Seattle: Experienced, is this weekend and it looks like it’s going to be an amazing event. If you’re going to attend we would love to meet you. Piklist lead developer Kevin Miller will be there to answer all your questions and help you build amazing websites with Piklist.

To meet with Kevin just send a tweet to @piklist and he’ll reply back. Then look for this guy:
